description: Skiva USBLink Extra Long (10 ft) Lighting Sync and Charge Cable is designed forthe Apple devices with lightning port.Slim Connector Head:Slim and lightning connector head (5.30mm & 9.05mm) is designed to workwith virtually all cases. So you don't need to remove protective caseswhile using this cable.Extra Long:Extra long length (10 ft) makes it suitable to use while charging in bed,sofa, cars, hotel rooms etc.Apple MFI Certified:Skiva's lightning cable is Apple's MFI certified so you get best qualitygenuine cable. It has original Apple lightning connector and authenticationchip from Apple. You can rest assured that it will not break with Apple'sfirmware updates unlike non-licensed cables.Compatibility:Support charge and sync of iPhone 5s, 5c, 5, iPad Air, 4, mini, mini with Retina,iPod Touch 5, iPod Nano 7.Warranty :It comes with 1 Year Warranty and full support from Skiva.Please contact Skiva support team for any issues at support@skivatech.com.
title: [Apple MFI Certified] Skiva USBLink Extra Long (10 ft) Lightning Sync and Charge Cable for iPhone 5s, 5c, 5, iPad Air, 4, mini, mini with Retina, iPod Touch 5, iPod Nano 7 [CB102] - 1 Year Warranty
